about_the_game:
Shadowrun: Hong Kong Official Soundtrack
From the composer of the award-winning Shadowrun: Dragonfall - Director's Cut soundtrack, Jon Everist, comes a completely new, original score (22 tracks - mp3, 320 kbps).


Shadowrun: Hong Kong Art Book (PDF)
Explore the beautiful and exotic world of Shadowrun: Hong Kong even more with a PDF of "behind-the-scenes" production artwork and finished images from the game.
detailed_description:
Shadowrun: Hong Kong Official Soundtrack
From the composer of the award-winning Shadowrun: Dragonfall - Director's Cut soundtrack, Jon Everist, comes a completely new, original score (22 tracks - mp3, 320 kbps).


Shadowrun: Hong Kong Art Book (PDF)
Explore the beautiful and exotic world of Shadowrun: Hong Kong even more with a PDF of "behind-the-scenes" production artwork and finished images from the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: x86-compatible 1.4GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern 3D graphics card with at least 256MB of addressable memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.5+
  • Processor: Intel-based Macs only (x86-compatible, 1.4GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Modern 3D graphics card with at least 256MB of addressable memory
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
